ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Entrapments And Undoings!: The Joes have the Baroness under lock and key in the Pit III, and Destro plans a rescue attempt using Zartan and the Dreadnoks, due to the Commander's indecisiveness to do so. Mindbender wonders why Billy wants to be subjected willingly to the brainwave scanner so many times, not knowing Dr. Venom's consciousness inside the machine has taken over Billy. While Storm Shadow goes to free his sword brother Snake-Eyes from Cobra, Snakes attempts to free himself from the scanner's influence, chasing after Venom's consciousness inside.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 14:56:43. [CVDB262300] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:38:37. [Issue ID 806086]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ron Wagner,S.L. Gallant,S. L. Gallant,Ron Wagner
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andrew Crossley,Herb Trimpe,James Brown (J. Brown),Larry Hama,Rod Whigham
ComicInfo.Characters: Baroness (captured by the Joes),Billy (under the late Dr. Venom's mental control via the brainwave scanner),Lady Jaye,Storm Shadow,Tele-Viper,Dr. Mindbender,Snake-Eyes (under the brainwave scanner's influence)],Greenshirts],G.I.
